item.title: Waves Intersecting at Right Angles and a Folded Paper
item.description: Perpendicular Intersecting Waves Problem Solution A Folded Paper Problem Solution: Minimum Area Reference library(knitr) library(tidyverse) library(ggthemes) opts_chunk$set( fig.align = "center", message = FALSE, warning = FALSE ) I found these two problems in Simmons (2016). I enjoyed these problems because they require more thinking than just a mechanical application of derivatives. Perpendicular Intersecting Waves Problem This problem appears in Simmons (2016) on page 119, item 24.
